intro:
Find the hidden mistakes among the sparkling stars!
From galaxies and planets to meteor showers and astronauts — it’s Spot the Difference: Space Photos!
description:
Relax with breathtaking and mysterious photos of space
while training your brain in this easy and fun spot-the-difference game!
Planets, galaxies, rockets, even astronauts —
discover stunning cosmic scenes packed with wonder!

How to play:
・Look closely at the “top” photo on the split screen.
・Find the differences in the flipped “bottom” photo.
・When you spot a mistake, just tap it!

It might look easy at first,
but reflections of starlight can really trick your eyes!
Perfect for a quick break or a relaxing challenge anytime.

Use the Hint Button only when you’re truly stuck —
(it gives a super obvious clue you won’t miss!)

The game supports both button controls and touch controls, allowing you to play in TV mode, handheld mode, or tabletop mode.
※This game is designed to be played on the Nintendo Switch™ in vertical orientation.
